name: ÆONS
description:
The universe used to be full of stars, so you’ve been told. They must have burned out.

Æons takes place during the Degenerate Era, a long age of silence and dying lights.  The marvels of the universe, like galaxies and nebulae, have long faded away. Only a few remaining stars, ancient beyond number, wither in the darkness as the inevitable end approaches. You are a creature that has made one of these stars a home, feeding off what scarce light you can. As your home star inevitably burns out, you must go forth into the uncertain depths and find a way to save your brethren from extinction.
